name: Under The Hood (itch)
description:
In the early hours of the morning, a mechanic is unexpectedly visited by a car like no other. A busted up AutoVehicle rolls into his workshop for urgent bio-repairs; the bonnet hiding a strange creature made of a living brain and organs grafted to the engine. It is hurt, desperate, and asking for his help.

Designed and Developed by Simon Wall and VanderHum

Music by Yoni Bresley

SFX by Jack Thompson

made over 48 hours at the Melbourne AUS Global Game Jam.
